name: Greninja V-UNION
rules: How to play a Pokémon V-UNION: Once per game during your turn, combine 4 different Greninja V-UNION from your discard pile and put them onto your Bench.
V-UNION rule: When your Pokémon V-UNION is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Ninja Body
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent plays an Item card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Feel the Way
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may have your opponent reveal their hand.

attacks.name: Union Gain
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 Water Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Twister Shuriken
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Waterfall Blind
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.
